rhemes.name: waiting
options: I've been waiting for a long time
I'm still waiting for my ride
There is no need to wait for me

rhemes.name: arrive late
options: I'll be late for our appointment

rhemes.name: pick up
options: I'm on my way to pick you up
You don't need to pick me up
I’m fine to go by walking

rhemes.name: shopping
options: I'm going to shopping, Would you like anything?
I’ll go to shopping with someone
I'm in the ${loc}, Do you need anything?
After work I have to buy food

rhemes.name: changing plan
options: I decided to change my plan
My plan has changed for tomorrow
I can’t come anymore, something came up!
I have to cancel our plan, can we reschedule?

rhemes.name: making plan
options: What are your plans for today?
What are your plans for tomorrow?
What are you going to do this weekend?
Where shall we go for dinner?
Do we have a companion for dinner?
What would you like for dinner?
Have you had your dinner yet?
Do you eat at home or out?

rhemes.name: get to a location
options: I can’t find you, where are you?
I am going in the wrong direction, I need help
I can’t tell where I am
The building is too big, I’m lost
I can’t find my way back
I'm waiting for you here. Come outside

rhemes.name: arrival time
options: I get there in a few minutes
I will interact with you at ${appointment}
An hour later I will come
I will return home in half an hour
I will return home in an hour
What time are you going to arrive for ${moment}?
I am on my way; will you arrive on time?

rhemes.name: on my way
options: I am on my way to home
I am getting ready to board the plane
I am on my way to pick you up

rhemes.name: signal my location
options: I'm about to get off the train
I'm about to get off the bus
There is an accident on the road

rhemes.name: bring food
options: Can you bring breakfast in the morning?
Can you bring lunch in the afternoon?
Today I will skip lunch, no need to bring food

rhemes.name: not able to talk
options: I’ll call you when I can
I’m unable to speak, I am in the middle of commute

rhemes.name: phone call
options: Shall I call you for a moment?
When is a good time to call?
Can we set up a phone call?

rhemes.name: check-in location
options: I'm in the ${loc}, where are you?

rhemes.name: check-in guest
options: Will you arrive on time for dinner?
Who is going to come for dinner?

rhemes.name: meeting
options: Don’t be late for the meeting!
There will be a meeting at ${meeting}
Are you ready for the upcoming meeting?
The meeting is just a few minutes away
I had a meeting this morning
I'm a little early for the meeting
When will the meeting be finished?
Everyone is coming to the meeting?
Who will be in the meeting?

rhemes.name: appointment
options: I will interact with you at ${appointment} for our appointment
Remember to come for our appointment
I have an appointment with a friend
A few hours countdown for our appointment
I am preparing for our appointment
I am on the way for an appointment
I have an appointment at the ${loc-cal}
I had an appointment this morning
Who wants to come to the appointment?
Will you arrive on time for the appointment?
Can we plan for later today?
When do you want to meet?
Where do you want to meet?
